text: The 1978 European Formula Three Championship was the fourth FIA European Formula 3 Championship season, contested over 16 rounds. Jan Lammers of the Netherlands won the drivers championship with 72 points. == Schedule == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! colspan="2" | Round ! Circuit ! Date |- ! colspan="2" | 1 | Circuit Park Zandvoort, Zandvoort | 27 March |- ! colspan="2" | 2 | Nürburgring, Nürburg | 2 April |- ! colspan="2" | 3 | Österreichring, Spielberg | 16 April |- ! colspan="2" | 4 | | Circuit Zolder, Heusden-Zolder | | 23 April |- ! colspan="2" | 5 | Autodromo Dino Ferrari, Imola | 14 May |- ! colspan="2" | 6 | Nürburgring, Nürburg | 28 May |- ! colspan="2" | 7 | Dijon-Prenois, Dijon | 4 June |- ! colspan="2" | 8 | Autodromo Nazionale Monza, Monza | 25 June |- ! colspan="2" | 9 | Autodromo di Pergusa, Pergusa | 2 July |- ! colspan="2" | 10 | Circuit de Nevers Magny- Cours, Magny-Cours | 16 July |- ! colspan="2" | 11 | Ring Knutstorp, Kågeröd | 6 August |- ! colspan="2" | 12 | Karlskoga Motorstadion, Karlskoga | 13 August |- ! colspan="2" | 13 | Donington Park, Leicestershire | 26 August |- ! colspan="2" | 14 | Kassel-Calden, Kassel | 3 September |- ! colspan="2" | 15 | Circuito del Jarama, Madrid | 17 September |- ! colspan="2" | 16 | ACI Vallelunga Circuit, Campagnano di Roma | 8 October |- |} == Results == {| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%;" ! colspan="2" | Round ! colspan="9" | Sources: http://www.formel3guide.com/saison/saison-1971-1980/saison-1978.html |} ==Season standings== ===Drivers standings=== For every race 9 points were awarded to the winner, 6 to the runner up, 4 for third place, 3 for fourth place, 2 for fifth place and 1 for sixth place. No additional points were awarded. Four scores were dropped. Dropped scores are shown in parentheses. Although Jan Lammers and Anders Olofsson tied on points and tied on four wins each, Lammers took the championship by virtue of scoring five second places to Olofsson's three. {|align=left| class="wikitable" style="font-size: 85%; text- align: center;" !
